name: BattleChords
description:
PRE-ALPHA

BattleChords is a Dynamic semi turn-based brawler where the players wield actual music as their weapon.

By merging music and fighting games, Battlechords enables you to experience a fusion of both genres. Turn the ultimate music battle into reality, all you have to do is grab your drumsticks and battle axe and shred your way through to the top.

Challenge other players to an objective Battle of the Bands. Using music as your weapon, jam it out in a dynamic semi-turn based brawler.

The Battlechords system is intricately designed to allow you, no matter your skill level, to rock the stage and participate in a musical journey with your own customized aesthetics and sounds.

Play with your friends and unlock new instruments and skins.
